project.name: Nature's Switch
project.description: Nature’s Switch is a film which explores red light affects plants in a range of settings at different times during the day and night. Commissioned by Wellcome Collection as part of On light, May 1 – 4 2015. Awards & Screenings: Labocine, 2017, Imagine Science Festival, October 2016, NYC, USA, Shuffle Festival, July 2016, East London, UK MUBI, 2015, Shuffle Festival, August 2015 – Won best short film (‘where we are going’), ASFF, November 2015, York, UK, London Short Film Festival Jan 2016, UK
